CHAT.comment: JOHN GEDDES LAWRENCE AND TYRON GARNER, Petitioners v. TEXAS.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:09 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL M. SMITH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CHARLES A. ROSENTHAL, JR. ON BEHALF OF TEXAS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL M. SMITH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:06 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter [*50] was submitted.)
